text: The 1998 Winter Olympics, officially known as the XVIII Olympic Winter Games, were held in 1998 in Nagano, Japan. Other possible host cities were Aosta, Italy; Jaca, Spain; Ã–stersund, Sweden; and Salt Lake City, USA. The selection was held in Birmingham, United Kingdom in 1991. ==Related pages== * Sports in Japan == Other websites == * IOC Site on 1998 Winter Olympics Category:1998 in Japan Category:1998 in Asian sport
title: 1998 Winter Olympics
